Plot: A married man's one night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.
Title: Fatal Attraction
Actors: Michael Douglas, Glenn Close, Anne Archer, Ellen Latzen
tomatoConsensus: A potboiler in the finest sense, Fatal Attraction is a sultry, juicy thriller that's hard to look away from once it gets going.
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 16 nominations.
